title: Tassel
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: braided and knotted
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: White linen tassel with braided stem connected to flattened sphere shape forming the base. Core is braided over with linen yarns worked in groups for a basket-weave effect. From the top of the braided stem hang a few knotted elements and more hang from the sides of the core.

tombstone.epitaph:
Tassel.
Medium: linen
Technique: braided and knotted. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-51-67.
